mapper.insert: INSERT INTO url_group (user_id, name, description, icon, color, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{icon}, #{color}, #{sortOrder}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE url_group SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, icon = #{icon}, color = #{color}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM url_group WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM url_group WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND name = #{name} AND status = 1 LIMIT 1
